name: project-poll-it
description: ## Requirements: - Node.js - Express.js - Handelbars.js - MySQL - Sequelize ORM - GET and POST routes (Express.js) - Use at least one new library, package, or technology that we haven't discussed. 	1. Polling npm package - Have a polished UI (HTML/CSS) - Include authentication (express-session and cookies) - Protect API keys and sensitive information with environment variables.
